Layout.SimulationWindow.SimulationWindow¶

class Layout.SimulationWindow.SimulationWindow(name, runner, free_parameter_values, plot_choices)[source]¶
This class contains the layout for the simulation window.

  1. Simulation tab. This tab allows the user to run the simulation and display desired results.

  2. Aesthetics tab. This tab allows the user to set plot aesthetic for the displayed figure.

  3. Analysis tabgroup. This tabgroup allows the user to determine how to execute analysis for plot.

Variables

  • plot_choices – name(s) of variable(s) and/or function(s) that the user may choose to plot

  • free_parameters – name(s) of parameter(s) that the user may choose multiple values for in model
